titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals with direct primary care service arrangements to remain eligible individuals for purposes of health savings accounts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Primary Care Enhancement Act of 2021
This bill permits a taxpayer with a primary care service arrangement whose fixed periodic fee does not exceed $150 a month to participate in and contribute to a health savings account.
